import React, { memo } from 'react' import { getSizeImage } from '@/utils/format-data.js' import { ToplistWrapper } from './style' export default memo(function Toplist(props) { const { info, index } = props const { tracks = [] } = info return (
{/* href="/discover/toplist?id=xxxx" */}
{/* href="/discover/toplist?id=xxxx" */}

{info.name}
{/* click here to play the music in the list */} 播放 收藏
{/*
{tracks && tracks.length > 0 && tracks.slice(0, 10).map((item, index) => { return (
{index + 1}
playMusic(e, item)}>{item.name}
playMusic(e, item)}>{item.name} addPlaylist(e,item.id)}>{item.name} {item.name}
) })}
*/} {/*
toLink(e)}>查看全部>
*/} ) })
